settings.text: 海と向き合うとき感じる心地よさを、忙しい日々の中でnanameicaの服と共に過ごしたい。シンプルで機能的、いつでも快適。

settings.title: Layer lightly
settings.text: Featuring elements of a Harrington jacket, including a dog-ear collar and ribbed hem, this outdoor vest is constructed from recycled nylon taffeta, making it lightweight and comfortable to wear. The distinctive red color, woven with black weft yarns and post-dyed, has a depth that creates dramatic shadows on its surface.

Wind Shorts [SUDS407U] $300.0+tax

settings.title: Black at the sea
settings.text: A simple jacket accented with a stand collar. Wear it oversized for a contemporary look. The wool/linen fabric has a texture that's expressive even in black. The reversible design with removable change buttons allows you to enjoy the navy side as well.
settings.product_list:
Wool Linen Jacket [SUAS405U] $520.0+tax
nanamica Loopwheel COOLMAX Jersey Tee [SUHF377U] $96.0+tax
Wool Linen Pants [SUCS404U] $400.0+tax

settings.title: By sea, by day
settings.text: A fresh take on a sports jacket popular in the UK, re-imagined in a crew style. The outer material is a 2-layer cotton twill GORE-TEX Fabrics that is highly waterproof and breathable. An inner wind guard at your waist reduces the intrusion of cold air.
